## [Codecov](https://app.codecov.io/gh/leoafarias/fvm/pull/956?dropdown=coverage&src=pr&el=h1&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github&utm_content=comment&utm_campaign=pr+comments&utm_term=Leo+Farias) Report
:white_check_mark: All modified and coverable lines are covered by tests.
:white_check_mark: Project coverage is 39.80%. Comparing base ([`3dfef1d`](https://app.codecov.io/gh/leoafarias/fvm/commit/3dfef1dfb6cc7f18e9287630a842903482796304?dropdown=coverage&el=desc&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github&utm_content=comment&utm_campaign=pr+comments&utm_term=Leo+Farias)) to head ([`c1737aa`](https://app.codecov.io/gh/leoafarias/fvm/commit/c1737aa47f4005b3c4dd23008d091823f6c13cf3?dropdown=coverage&el=desc&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github&utm_content=comment&utm_campaign=pr+comments&utm_term=Leo+Farias)).
:warning: Report is 1 commits behind head on main.

<details><summary>Additional details and impacted files</summary>



```diff
@@            Coverage Diff             @@
##             main     #956      +/-   ##
==========================================
+ Coverage   39.43%   39.80%   +0.36%     
==========================================
  Files          75       75              
  Lines        4339     4339              
==========================================
+ Hits         1711     1727      +16     
+ Misses       2628     2612      -16     
```
</details>

[:umbrella: View full report in Codecov by Sentry](https://app.codecov.io/gh/leoafarias/fvm/pull/956?dropdown=coverage&src=pr&el=continue&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github&utm_content=comment&utm_campaign=pr+comments&utm_term=Leo+Farias).   
:loudspeaker: Have feedback on the report? [Share it here](https://about.codecov.io/codecov-pr-comment-feedback/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github&utm_content=comment&utm_campaign=pr+comments&utm_term=Leo+Farias).
<details><summary> :rocket: New features to boost your workflow: </summary>

- :snowflake: [Test Analytics](https://docs.codecov.com/docs/test-analytics): Detect flaky tests, report on failures, and find test suite problems.
</details>

title: refactor: migrate release tooling to dedicated package structure
